data.title: 14 Most Powerful MP4 Converter Tools for Your Devices
data.meta_description: If you desire to convert your MP4 to other file types, we have the solution. Click here to learn about the best MP4 converters.
data.text:
MP4 is a prevalent video format because it makes files smaller without losing quality and works on almost any device or player. Since so many people use MP4, there's a growing need for tools to change videos into MP4 and back again; whether switching formats or not, having a good video converter can be helpful. Therefore, we searched for the most popular and best MP4 converter tools that you can use, whether you are using your Windows, Mac, iPhone, or Android device. Furthermore, we listed online MP4 converters for you to try. Continue reading this post to learn more.

Part 1. Best MP4 Converters for Mac/Windows

There are tons of applications that enable you to convert your MP4 file format to other video file types. Thus, not all have the best features and are affordable. So, in this part, we will show you the best MP4 converters for your Mac or Windows PC. But first here is a detailed comparison between the tools below.

1. Tipard Video Converter Ultimate

First on the listing is Tipard Video Converter Ultimate. This fantastic application is known for its top-tier video editing features and converting methods. With this application, you can convert your MP4 file to almost all file formats because it has comprehensive file support. For instance, you can convert your MP4 file to AVI, MOV, M4V, MP3, SWF, and many more. Moreover, Tipard Video Converter Ultimate has many video editing features, like a 3D maker, GIF maker, video compressor, and video watermark remover. Whatâs even excellent with this tool is that it offers a high-speed conversion process, making it more convenient. In addition, many beginners love using this tool because it has an easy-to-use software interface. Therefore, to use this ultimate tool, click the Download buttons below.

2. MediaCoder

Next among the best MP4 video converters is MediaCoder, which has been around since 2005 and keeps getting updated with new features and codecs. You have to download and install the software, which lets you change between the most popular audio and video formats and even copy DVDs/CDs. It offers a bunch of settings so you can adjust things just right, plus there are different filters to improve your audio and video content. If you want more features, there's a Premium version you can upgrade to.

3. Movavi Video Converter

Movavi Video Converter is a simple video-to-MP4 converter that helps you change video, audio, and image files into over 180 formats, including ones that support smooth playback at 60 frames per second. It's straightforward to use and has lots of features. You can use it to switch between different types of media files without any hassle, shrink videos without losing quality, or even add subtitles to your favorite movies. Plus, it lets you edit videos by cutting them, changing their size, adding effects, and adjusting how bright or colorful they are. It also works quickly to convert many videos in just a few minutes.

4. Totally Free Converter

Totally Free Converter is an excellent pick if you're just starting and need free software to convert videos or audio files. It only works on Windows and handles all the popular video and audio formats. Its easy-to-use interface is simple to figure out, especially for beginners. This free MP4 converter sets up video quality and output options, but you can tweak them in the settings. And if you mess up, you can easily reset everything to how it was.

5. Oxelon Media Converter

Oxelon Media Converter is also among the best free MP4 converters made for Windows. It doesn't put any logos or time limits on your converted files. It's perfect for beginners because it's simple to understand and works with almost any video or audio format. You can convert several files at once without any logos, and you can change things like the video quality or audio settings. Plus, it's handy because it works from your Windows Explorer - just right click on a file to convert it.

6. HandBrake

HandBrake is a good MP4 converter. It's a popular and free video converter that works on Mac, Windows, and Linux. It's updated regularly and can do more than just convert videos - it can also create DVDs by copying movies from DVDs. It might seem tricky for beginners but it has ready-made settings for different quality levels and devices. If you're more experienced, you can tweak the settings however you like. HandBrake can process multiple videos simultaneously, handle different frame rates, and apply various filters to your videos.

Part 2. MP4 Converter App for iPhone/Android

However, if you do not have a PC or laptop, you can use your Android or iPhone device for media conversion. Luckily, there are applications for this.

1. Video Converter, Compressor

Video Converter, Compressor among Android devices is the most downloaded MP4 converter app. This app is excellent for changing videos into different formats and making them smaller. You can also edit them by adjusting size, quality, and sound. It lets you cut out parts you don't need and even mix different audio tracks. It works with popular video formats like MP4, AVI, MOV, and MKV, offering many choices for your video's look and sound.

2. Video Converter & Compressor (MP4, AVI, MOV, MKV)

Another MP4 converter for Android is Video Converter & Compressor. This app is one of the best for converting videos and making them smaller. You can choose between high-quality or lower-quality compression. It lets you change the video's resolution and bitrate but doesn't have editing features. It works with various formats, such as MP4, AVI, MKV, MOV, 3GP, and FLV. You can also turn your videos into audio files.

3. Free Video Converter App

This app is best for changing, compressing, and editing videos. Its editing tools allow you to cut, merge, and add effects like slow motion. It works with over 200 devices and supports popular file formats like MP4, AVI, MOV, and MP3. You can even turn MP3 files into videos or extract audio from videos using this app.

4. The Video Converter

Also on the list is The Video Converter. This MP4 converter is among the most outstanding MP4 converter for iPhone. The Video Converter is praised as the best free tool for converting videos to play on iPhones. It offers many options for video and audio formats, making it easy to convert almost any type of video to one that works on your iPhone with just a click. Plus, it's brilliant - it can adjust videos to look great on your iPhone's screen by helping you pick the best resolution. With its practical features, this converter is an excellent choice for anyone looking to convert videos for their iPhone.

5. PlayerXtreme Media Player

PlayXtreme is designed to make watching videos and movies easy on all devices, including iPhones. It can play and stream almost any video, music, or photo format without converting them first. It has a simple interface that's easy to use, with controls that work well and a search bar to help you find what you need quickly. It also enables you to organize your media files neatly, even when you add many at once. Download and install it, and you can immediately enjoy your iPhone videos.

Part 3. Online MP4 Converters

If you want to use a convenient MP4 converter that you do not need to download, you can use these online MP4 converters below. Below are the most popular online MP4 converter websites you can try.

1. FLVTO - MP4 Converter Online Free

FLVTO is a tool that helps you save YouTube videos. You can change them into different types of files like MP4 or MP3. Just copy the video file link and paste it into FLVTO. Then, it turns the video into the format you want. After that, you can download it. FLVTO doesn't just work with YouTube. It also converts music from other websites like Facebook or Vimeo. Plus, it is supported by Windows, macOS, and Linux.

2. AConvert

AConvert is a well-known website where you can change your MP4 and other types of files into different formats. You can upload files from your computer, a web link, Google Drive, or Dropbox to convert them. It works right in your web browser, so you don't need to download or install anything. The process is simple and quick. You can also adjust settings like the quality and size of the converted file.

3. OnlineConvert.com

Online Convert is a super popular MP4 converter online that lets you upload files from your computer, the Internet, or cloud storage. It can convert files into different formats that many people use. You can also change the quality and size of the converted file.
